summary: HD retexture of swords from hucifer’s “The Witcher 2 – Geralt Light Armor and Witcher Swords”
descriptionHtml:
Witcher 2 swords HD
This is a retexture I\'ve made for myself and then I decided to share it.

You need hucifers The Witcher 2 – Geralt Light Armor and Witcher Swords file that can be find here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6006
If you like this mod, please go and give him your endorsement!

Known Issues: normal maps does not work for some reason. if someone can tell me what\'s wrong, I\'ll do these swords better.

installation: use NMM or just extract files into Skyrim folder
author: Suhoi72
